name: Bobble Construccioni
description:
Dive, Build, Think

Bobble Construccione combines the best elements of puzzle and construction games - build sophisticated structures out of bubbles and lead small, cute, soapy monstrosities back home.

Absurdity

In keeping with tradition, our game is an epitome of the studio's inside humor.  Pieces of art, scattered across the game and even this very site demonstrate that our studio isn't afraid of taking leaps of faith, even if we are to land in depths of uncanny valley.

Made for "Bubbles" Mini Jam

Theme: Bubbles - main protagonists of our creation

Limitation: You are your own ammo - You can use Bobbles to build constructions and construct buildings.

Tested on Windows 10, Mac Mojave, Linux Manjaro & Ubuntu 20

Changelog: (these changes were made after the jam)

  • Added 'play' button that makes happy bubbles spawn (previously there was a really small button on dispenser) (12.07.21)
